## Summary

Describe what changed and why. Link issues/specs.

## Constitution Gates (must pass)

- [ ] Privacy & Consent: Redaction controls present; no PII in logs
- [ ] Security & Retention: Encryption in transit/at rest; retention defaults respected; deletion paths tested
- [ ] Quality Evaluation: Tests updated; eval suite run; no >2% relative regression without approved justification
- [ ] Transparency: Summaries link to timestamps/speakers; model/pipeline version surfaced
- [ ] Observability & Versioning: Structured, redacted logs; correct SemVer bump; changelog entry included

## Tests

- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Integration/e2e tests added/updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Evaluation report attached (artifact or summary)

## Rollout

- [ ] Changelog updated
- [ ] Rollout plan (A/B or staged) documented if user-facing
- [ ] Rollback procedure identified

## Risk/Impact

- Data model/API changes?:
- Migration required?:
- Security implications?:

## Checklist

- [ ] Docs updated (README/quickstart/architecture as needed)
- [ ] Monitoring/alerts updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Owner/reviewer sign-off
